attributes.action: treat persons injureing or killing a police dog to be charged the same as if they injure or kill a police officer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
if a person stabs, shoots,injures in any way , or kills a serving  police dog while on duty, they only get charged with damaging police equipment.
they should be charged as they would if they do the same to a serving police officer.

rejection.details:
A petition already exists on this subject:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/policedogassault/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
